entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Near blizzard developing before morning. Blowing snow overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Near blizzard. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Near blizzard. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 39 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow at times in the evening and after midnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Friday 20 January 2023
